laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 5.0 g/dL on 8/14/1997, rose to 12.1 g/dL on 12/5/1997, dropped to 3.5 g/dL on 2/18/1998, rose to 12.8 g/dL on 1/2/1999.
Dropped to 4 cells/mm³ on 10/22/1997, rose to 139 cells/mm³ on 1/2/1999, then 231 and 312 cells/mm³ on 4/6/1999 and 7/20/1999 respectively.
Decreased to 172 copies/mL on 10/22/1997, returned to 1.18 copies/mL on 11/30/1998, then below detection limit (!0.4 copies/mL) on 1/2/1999 onwards.
Became detectable on 30/11/1998 with a result of 36 U.
Rose to 1.72 on 11/30/1998 and decreased slightly to 1.59 on subsequent tests.
Reported to spike again in July 1998 before slowly decreasing with salvage therapy.
